metadata.og:title: Thomas Vinçotte. Equestrian statue of Leopold II
metadata.og:description: KU Leuven. Glass slides art history. Université de Louvain, between 1839 and 1939. Photographer unknown. Added information on slide. Movement / Style: Impressionism. Creation/Building: 1926. Technique/Material: Bronze. Current location: Belgium, Brussels, Place du Trône. EuroPhot. Art History. 20th century. Sculpture. Statue. EuroPhot. Art history. 20th century. Sculptures. Statue.
